game.name: Puzzle Spy International
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Captions available, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Pursue diamond thieves and a trail of cryptic puzzles in this short ‘60s spy adventure. As Agent Epsilon you’ll choose your path as you chat with (or chat up!) suspicious contacts. Deduce the puzzle rules, decode cryptograms and decipher clues as you solve wordplay & logic puzzles across the globe!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Pursue diamond thieves and a trail of cryptic puzzles in this short ‘60s spy adventure. Deduce the puzzle rules, decode cryptograms and decipher clues as you solve wordplay & logic puzzles across the globe!
